thread.title: Agatha, A Cute Purple Kitchen Witch That Sits on a Spoon and Prevents Your Pot’s Lid From Closing
thread.title_full: Agatha, A Cute Purple Kitchen Witch That Sits on a Spoon and Prevents Your Pot’s Lid From Closing

author: Justin Page
title: Agatha, A Cute Purple Kitchen Witch That Sits on a Spoon and Prevents Your Pot’s Lid From Closing

organizations.name: baby loch ness monster tea infuser whose wee little head pokes

text:
A post shared by OTOTO Design (@ototodesign) on Jan 4, 2017 at 7:00am PST 

Product and graphic designer Uli Ben Israel teamed up with OTOTO to create Agatha , a cute little purple kitchen witch designed to sit on a spoon and prevent your pot’s lid from closing. Agatha is available to purchase from Amazon and the OTOTO store .
Double, Double, Toil and Trouble… Concocting a delicious potion? Agatha will hold your spoon and release the steam from your bubbling pot!




A post shared by OTOTO Design (@ototodesign) on Jan 29, 2017 at 9:33am PST 

images via OTOTO
